summary:
This mod add a complete light armor and weapons set.

All the set have dragonscale stat. and craftable at forge under dragon item, weapon under steel.
You can enchant or improve all armor and weapons.

Unfortunatly, there's no Helmet and Hooded helmet for Khajiit and Argonian
so those are replaced by basic ho
descriptionHtml:
I Will Update When I get Some Free Time

And Yes I Know I Changed My Account So i Removed and Re-Uploaded My Mods

There's a bit of a prob with the color on the gauntlets don't kno if its just on my end or not so plz tell me if you have the same prob

[url=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/846/darkscout.jpg/][img]http://img846.imageshack.us/img846/5969/darkscout.jpg[/img][/url]

This mod add a complete light armor and weapons set.

All the set have dragonscale stat. and craftable at forge under dragon item, weapon under steel.
You can enchant or improve all armor and weapons.

Unfortunately, there's no Helmet and Hooded helmet for Khajiit and ArgoniansÂ 
so those are replaced by basic hoods.
__________________________________________________________________________
Adding A none NMM file that will change the Arrow fly's Color:
Not all of the arrows mod has been fixed but the Blue has.

Blue
Brown
Gray
Green
Orange
Purple
Red
Yellow
__________________________________________________________________________

ITEMS LIST :

Boots
Gauntlets
Cuirass
Helmet
Hood Leather
Hood tissu + 3 Variant : Forest, Land, Snow
Capes + 3 Variant : Forest, Land, Snow
Helmet with hood + 3 Variant : Forest, Land, Snow
Dagger acting as a Shield

Sword
Dagger
Reversed Dagger
Bow /Requires Elven Smithing
Arrows
__________________________________________________________________________
If you want to cheat and get the armor b4 u get dragon smithing
type in console: Help Scout then

type: player.additem

xx001563 - Armor
xx001562 - Boots
xx001564 - Gloves
xx001567 - Bow
xx00156a - Arrows
xx000d70 - Sword

'xx' is load order
__________________________________________________________________________
Future Plans:
the new esp is not gonna be in the next version until i sort the cloak out
adding a new bow (Maybe for higher levels)
disappearing armor bug (working on this)
Arrow Quiver sitting too high (maybe l8r)
Looking for a new Sword (Becoz i don't like the steel Sword
Looking for a Shield
__________________________________________________________________________
Bugs: Plz tell me so i can try fix them
__________________________________________________________________________
Hopefully in the next addition there maybe a new esp with fixes to the armor and weapons for example new names and bug fixes
__________________________________________________________________________
EvilDeadAsh34 made an optional file for Scout Arrow and i thanks him really for that :)
this mod moves your characters quivers closer to their bodies so they are no longer floating in mid-air. And it\'s great !

You can download it here :
Closer Quivers and Longer Arrows by EvilDeadAsh34
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5711
__________________________________________________________________________

Kevkas made an optional file for Scout Arrow. Thanks to him ! I know that it was not without troubles :)
this mod add several tweaks on arrows :
FASTER ARROWS - PROGRESSIVE DAMAGE - RECOVER ARROWS - LOOT ARROWS - MERCHANTS ARROWS

You can download it here :
Arrows Tweaks by Kevkas
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11941
__________________________________________________________________________
